meanings.definition: The state of being insatiable or unable to be satisfied.
meanings.sent1: Her insatiateness for knowledge led her to read every book in the library.
meanings.sent2: His insatiateness for sweets always resulted in a trip to the candy store.
meanings.sent3: The insatiateness of the puppy for treats was both adorable and endless.
meanings.sent4: The insatiateness of the ocean for ships is a powerful force of nature.
meanings.sent5: The insatiateness of the fire for fuel consumed everything in its path.

meanings.definition: The quality of having an insatiable appetite or desire.
meanings.sent1: The insatiateness of his ambition drove him to achieve great success.
meanings.sent2: Her insatiateness for adventure led her to travel to far-off lands.
meanings.sent3: The insatiateness of the toddler for toys made playtime a constant joy.
meanings.sent4: The insatiateness of the artist for inspiration fueled their creative output.
meanings.sent5: The insatiateness of the storm for destruction left a path of chaos in its wake.
